Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
_uMexOptionMEX option
_VlAIBAIB algorithm data
_VlFileMetaSupport for command line drivers - Definition
_VlHIKMNodeHIKM tree node
_VlHIKMTreeHIKM tree
_VlIKMFiltIKM quantizer
_VlMserExtrRegMSER: extremal region (declaration)
_VlMserFiltMSER filter
_VlMserRegMSER: basic region (declaration)
_VlMserStatsMSER filter statistics definition
_VlPgmImagePGM image meta data
_VlQSQuick shift results
_VlSiftFiltSIFT filter
_VlSiftKeypointSIFT filter keypoint
optiongetopt_long option
VlDsiftDescriptorGeometry_Dense SIFT descriptor geometry
VlDsiftFilter_Dense SIFT filter
VlDsiftKeypoint_Dense SIFT keypoint
